record.name: Set Incident Number if Not Delay assigning

rule.ruleDesc: Set Incident ID using a Number record
rule.condition: null(number in $L.file) and not (nullsub(sequential in $G.pm.global.environment, false))
rule.conditionDesc: ( Expression: null(number in $L.file) and not nullsub(sequential in $G.pm.global.environment, false))
rule.conditionXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate="" ><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="expression"><Expression caption="">"null(number in $L.file) and not nullsub(sequential in $G.pm.global.environment, false)"</Expression></operand></condition></collection></XmlCondition>
rule.fullDesc: Set Incident ID using a Number record (when ( Expression: null(number in $L.file) and not nullsub(sequential in $G.pm.global.environment, false)))
